home.title: Software Developer
description: Hello, my name is Matheus Ricardo. I am a software developer in training, passionate about technology and motivated by continuous learning to solve complex problems.

I am currently pursuing a Bachelor's degree in Information Systems at Mackenzie Presbyterian University. I am driven by challenges that span the entire software development cycle, from the conception of an application to its scalable cloud infrastructure.
I enjoy transforming prototypes into functional and robust code, focusing on creating high-impact solutions, as I have demonstrated in projects and innovation hackathons. Welcome to my portfolio!
Here you will find a little more about my journey, skills, and the most relevant projects I have developed.

Involved in the complete development cycle of iOS applications, from idea conception to publication. I was responsible for translating wireframes and interface prototypes (UI/UX) into functional and robust code. I programmed all the application's features, culminating in the successful preparation and submission of the app to the App Store.
Project: DBoard
